moves.1. e4 c5 2. b4 cxb4 3. a3 bxa3: I had forgotten how much fun the Sicilian wing gambit can be.
moves.4. Nf3 e6 5. d4 d5 6. e5 Nc6 7. c3 Bd7 8: Now if I can only get my Knight to d6!
moves.9... Nge7 10. Nb5 O-O 11. Nd6 Nf5: A forward Knight is a fearsome beast.  Wreaking havoc.
moves.12. Nxb7 Qb6 13. Nc5: First he takes the pawn, then he attacks the bishop.
moves.13... Rfd8 14. Bd3 Be8 15. O-O a5 16. Rb: ??  Worst move possible.   Should have played Qc7 instead.
